content:
fitzgen edited Issue #928 (assigned to fitzgen):

This is a tracking issue for the bulk memory operations proposal.

TODO:

  • [ ] Enable the bulk memory proposal's test suite
    * [x] binary.wast
    * [x] bulk.wast
    * [x] custom.wast
    * [ ] data.wast
    * [x] elem.wast
    * [ ] imports.wast
    * [x] linking.wast
    * [x] memory_copy.wast
    * [x] memory_fill.wast
    * [ ] memory_init.wast
    * [x] table_init.wast
    * [x] table_copy.wast

  • [ ] Enable bulk memory in the fuzzers
